channel.title: Sad Griefer
channel.description: I moved it to the report sticky

item.title: Sad Griefer
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:5, topic:377942”]If I may, I shall back up my case.

Roughly 10 seconds before, he put up 2 walls of cobblestone where doors used to be. Not a legit door.
No sign on his house. How do I know he’s not robbing? I didn’t see any chests when I arrived. I got one slice on u before u logged out. I found that unfair u could log out during my killing of u, and therefor planted a contained bucket of lava in the spot where u log in, where I camped.
I will say this: I broke nothing in your house BESIDES the cobblestone, set up moments before. I did not see any chests, and if I did, I would have attempted to loot. If u have chests with passwords, they can’t be destroyed or entered. As Davidi put it before, to those who have no password “find a better hiding place”.[/quote]

If it’s fair for you to kill him, then it’s certainly fair for him to log off before you finish. However it is against the rules to grief, even if you find something ‘unfair’, so I’m going to ban you for a day so maybe you will learn your lesson.

Read full topic

item.title: Sad Griefer
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Mr Mopar X, post:8, topic:377942”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=473824.msg3464618#msg3464618 date=1294794923]
If I may, I shall back up my case.

Roughly 10 seconds before, he put up 2 walls of cobblestone where doors used to be. Not a legit door.
No sign on his house. How do I know he’s not robbing? I didn’t see any chests when I arrived. I got one slice on u before u logged out. I found that unfair u could log out during my killing of u, and therefor planted a contained bucket of lava in the spot where u log in, where I camped.
I will say this: I broke nothing in your house BESIDES the cobblestone, set up moments before. I did not see any chests, and if I did, I would have attempted to loot. If u have chests with passwords, they can’t be destroyed or entered. As Davidi put it before, to those who have no password “find a better hiding place”.
[/quote]

I didn’t even have doors. As I said before someone griefed my house and I assumed it was you. However, you did break down the cobblestone that was set there. However, the cobblestone has been there for 2 days, I did not add it, you broke it down.

I don’t want you banned but I do want my stuff back.[/quote]

How did u get into the house then?

Read full topic

I don’t want you banned but I do want my stuff back.

item.title: Sad Griefer
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:6, topic:377942”][quote author=RuneSpace link=topic=473824.msg3464628#msg3464628 date=1294795459]

If I may, I shall back up my case.

Roughly 10 seconds before, he put up 2 walls of cobblestone where doors used to be. Not a legit door.
No sign on his house. How do I know he’s not robbing? I didn’t see any chests when I arrived. I got one slice on u before u logged out. I found that unfair u could log out during my killing of u, and therefor planted a contained bucket of lava in the spot where u log in, where I camped.
I will say this: I broke nothing in your house BESIDES the cobblestone, set up moments before. I did not see any chests, and if I did, I would have attempted to loot. If u have chests with passwords, they can’t be destroyed or entered. As Davidi put it before, to those who have no password “find a better hiding place”.

Was this in varock?
[/quote]

NO…[/quote]

He doesn’t even know where it is.

Read full topic
